transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello?
Customer: Yes.
Executive: Ha, madam Kashmir se baat kar raha hun Munna Gani dry fruit se.
Customer: Hanji hanji sir.
Executive: Ji, wo IndiaMART ka page open nahi ho raha hai char panch din se.
Customer: Accha, mai sir check karti hun koi glitch aa gaya hoga is vajah se maybe ek bar google pe dal ke try kariye.
Customer: Nahi kyuki nahi wo page to open ho raha hai magar usme jo buyleads hai na buyleads open nahi ho rahi hai.
Executive: Consume nahi kar pa rahe ho?
Customer: Mai buyleads pe click kar raha hun to wo page open nahi ho raha wo wo wo na upload nahi ho raha hai.
Customer: Wo dikha nahi raha hai kuch.
Customer: Panch che din se ye problem magar ye khali mere ko hi problem nahi hai bahut sare logo ko problem hai.
Executive: Mai ek bar sir check kar deti hun actually aaj to close hai mai ek bar kal ye aapka check karwa deti hun sir.
Customer: Zara aap check kara dijiye.
(silence)
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer's IndiaMART page is not opening.

- Buyleads are not opening on the page.



Resolution:

- Executive assured to check the issue.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will check the issue next day.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, page opening issue, technical issue
